pageProduct.name: U By Kotex Sport Tampons Super 16 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

U By Kotex® Super Sport Tampons provide Protection-In-Motion, designed for your workout. The multi-directional grooves expand and adapt to your body as you move to catch leaks no matter which way you go. Super Sport Tampons give you all the protection you need even on heavy days. Super in absorbency doesn't mean super in size. They are slim and have a comfortable design, while offering you leakage protection with the last line of defence. Comes in a resealable gym-handy pouch to protect the tampons in your gym bag and prevent any flying missiles!

  • Designed for your workout with Protection-In-Motion: multi-directional grooves that expand & adapt as you move to catch leaks no matter which way you go
  • Leakage protection with the last line of defence
  • Packaged in a resealable zip-close gym-handy pouch, to protect the tampons in your gym bag and prevent any flying missiles!
  • They are slim and have a comfortable design for easy use
  • Perfect for heavy flow days, with 14g absorbency

This product may not be right for you. Read the warning on pack before purchase and follow the instructions for use.

Suitable For: For heavy flow.

Boxed Contents: 16 tampons, gym handy pouches inside.

Size: 16 Pack

Warnings

Tampon use has been associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Read and keep the enclosed information. Please do not flush product or packaging. Do not flush down the toilet. Do not use if wrapper is open or damaged.

Directions

Please dispose of plastic and gym pouch through redcycle program (redcycle.net.au) and carton in your kerbside recycling bin.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
